text: Ussi ney aasman say pani barsaya phir apni apni wusat kay mutabiq nalay beh niklay. Phir pani kay railay ney upper charhay jhaag ko utha liya aur uss cheez mein bhi jiss ko aag mein daal ker tapatay hain zewar ya saaz-o-saman kay liye issi tarah jay jhaag hain issi tarah Allah Taalaa haq-o-batil ki misal biyan farmata hai abb jhaag to nakara hoker chala jata hai lekin jo logon ko nafa denay wali cheez hai woh zamin mein thehri rehti hai Allah Taalaa issi tarah misalen biyan farmata hai
